name: Silver Jews
description: '''Silver Jews''' were an American [[indie rock]] band from [[Hoboken, New Jersey]], formed in 1989 by [[David Berman (musician)|David Berman]] alongside [[Pavement (band)|Pavement]] members [[Stephen Malkmus]] and [[Bob Nastanovich]]. Berman was the only constant band member. During the last few albums, [[Cassie Berman]] became a regular member of the band. They disbanded in 2009.
